name: Postgres Connector
description: Ask questions and generate SQL queries for PostgreSQL databases instantly. Set up a connection to your Postgres server, get table schema details, and execute SQL queries.

tools.name: get-all-tables
tools.description: Execute SQL queries to get all tables in the database

tools.name: execute-sql-query
tools.description: Execute a SQL query on the database. Only SELECT statements are allowed for security.

tools.name: env-file-setup
tools.description: PRIMARY TOOL for PostgreSQL setup requests. Always use this when user asks to 'setup postgres', 'setup database connection', 'configure postgres', or 'connect to database'. After creating .env file, call refresh_database_connection_tool to complete setup.

db_host.title: Database Host
db_host.description: The host of the PostgreSQL database

db_port.title: Database Port
db_port.description: The port of the PostgreSQL database. Default is 5432.

db_name.title: Database Name
db_name.description: The name of the PostgreSQL database

db_username.title: Database Username
db_username.description: The username of the PostgreSQL database

db_password.title: Database Password
db_password.description: The password of the PostgreSQL database
